title: Cast us not out: a film about old age
creator_credit: Samaritan Films, Jewish Welfare Board, Richard Crewdson and Richard Bigham
brief_description: Examines the plight of the old in our society, showing the work that is being done by such organizations as the Jewish Welfare Board to alleviate the problem. Experts present the harsh facts of aging and stress the unwillingness of society to confront them. Considers some of the problems of institutional care.
